data.content:
Handoff 2026-02-23T17:15:17Z: Implemented compatibility-first Knots support (auto routing, Knots backend, tracker-aware prompts, API capability-aware statuses), added coverage and docs, and created hierarchical g3y1 child beads plus follow-up epic foolery-knots-native. Commit: 3922a76.
Rebase update 2026-02-23T17:17:29Z: commit label updated to 1f02ab1 after rebasing onto origin/main.
Push complete 2026-02-23T17:24:08Z: commit 1f02ab1 rebased and pushed to origin/main.
